name: Phin & Matt's Extroidinary Ale
description: After sampling a wide array of great beers, the duo hit upon an idea.  "I've got it!" exclaimed Matt, "we'll use vast amounts of whole hops, the finest malt, and put a little love in each batch."  "Eureka!" shouted Phin.  And thus became a beer so fresh and tasty they had to put their names on it.
